titleStmt.title: W. O. Boyle to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG14289

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 11

body.p:
Lexington Ky Oct 31st 1864
Gen. D. W. Lindsay
General:
I have the honor to make the following recommendations for promotion in the 11' Ky Cav.
2nd Lt Rufus Somerby to be Capt Co "M" vice Mangan
Sergt Jno Bradburn to be 2nd Lieut Co "M" " Somerby
" Jas Powell to be 1st Lieut Co "F." vice Dickinson resigned
Sergt B. F. Lewis to be 2nd Lieut Co "K" vice Harris Resgd

I am Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
W. O. Boyle
Lt Col 11' Ky Cav

Boyle W. O.
Lt Col 11" Ky Cavy

Recommends 2" Lieut Rufus Somerby to be Capt "M" Vice Mangan -- Sergt Jno. Bradburn to be 2" Lt Co (M) Vice Somerby -- Sergt Jas Powell to be 1" Lt Co. (F) Vice Dickerson resig and sergt B. F. Lewis to be 2" Lt Co (K) Vice Harris resig-
Lewis has been Comd 2d Lt vice Harris
